00013 ActorBase::ActorBase (PhysString name, PhysString file)
00014 {
00015     this->MotionState = new btDefaultMotionState();
00016     this->Shape = new btEmptyShape();
00017     this->CreateEntity(name, file, "Default");
00018 }
